p: Purified fractions of the four recombinant NS1DENV1–4 proteins were evaluated in electrophoresis on SDS-PAGE gel, Western blot was performed using a serum pool of dengue-positive patients, and the PAS reaction confirmed that the NS1DENV1–4 proteins expressed in Pichia pastoris were glycosylated ( Figure 4). The results of the four labels correspond to a 45 kDa band.
